# dataproductportal_data_product_type (Resource)

Manages a data product type.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "dataproductportal_data_product_type" "example" {
  name        = "Analytical"
  description = "Analytical data product type"
  icon_key    = "analytics"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `description` (String) The description.
- `icon_key` (String) The icon key.
- `name` (String) The name.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier.
